data.title: Paul Davis Obituary
data.meta_description: Paul Brian Davis May 4, 1944 Oct. 13, 2016 Paul Brian Davis, a resident of Novato passed away following a long illness. He is survived by his wife, Karen of
data.text:
Paul Brian Davis OBITUARY

Paul Brian Davis May 4, 1944 Oct. 13, 2016 Paul Brian Davis, a resident of Novato passed away following a long illness. He is survived by his wife, Karen of 48 years, daughter Christine (Jerry), son Thomas (Vicki), grandchildren Lauren, Matthew and Jacqueline; brother John, sister Angela; cousins and nieces and nephews. Paul was born in New Jersey to Dr. & Mrs. Thomas C. Davis. He was raised in Short Hills, NJ graduating from Millburn High School in 1962. Attended the University of the Pacific graduating in 1966 earning a BA degree in Int’l Relations. He was a member of Delta Upsilon Fraternity. In 1967, after graduating from American Graduate School for Int’l Management in AZ he began his working career with Otis Elevator Co., Int’l division. While attending UOP he met his future wife Karen. They were married in 1968. After living and working overseas they returned to CA settling in Novato in 1975. He then pursued his lifelong sales career in insurance and financial investments. He was a member and past president of (NAIFA) National Assoc. of Insurance and Financial Advisors, SIRS branch 134 and Trout Unlimited. Gardening, fishing, traveling, reading and cooking were many of his favorite activities. Paul, a sociable, friendly, outgoing person enjoyed family and friends. A devoted, loving, gentle husband, father and friend he will be truly missed by all. A Memorial Mass is to be held at Our Lady of Loretto in Novato, October 28 at 10:30 am. In lieu of flowers donations may be made to your favorite charity.
